This is to evaluate a portfolio of optional for its total value.

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo= FALSE}
library(fOptions)
library(lubridate)
library(bizdays)
```

```{r option_value, echo=FALSE}
df <- data.frame(type = sample(c("c", "p"), 100, replace = TRUE),
                 strike = round(runif(100) * 100, 0),
                 underlying = round(runif(100) * 100, 0),
                 Time = 1,
                 r = 0.01,
                 b = 0,
                 sigma = 0.3)
df <- dplyr::mutate(df, value = GBSOption(TypeFlag = type, S = strike, X = underlying, Time = Time/12, r = r, b = b, sigma = sigma)@price)
total_value <- sum(df$value)

msg <- paste0( "The total value of the 100 options in this portfolio is: ", format(round(total_value, 2), nsmall = 2))
msg

df

```
